videos.description: Tyus Battle's third 3-pointer of the second half gives the Orange its largest lead.
videos.headline: Syracuse's Battle buries 3-pointer

videos.description: Tyrus Battle drains a deep 3-pointer to extend the lead for Syracuse.
videos.headline: Battle from swishes from downtown

videos.description: Tim Bond's tomahawk dunk brings fans out of their seats.
videos.headline: EMU's Bond slams it down with authority
